default.name: Dragon Project
default.description: A monster-slaying action RPG featuring real-time co-op play on mobile.

articles.title: Guaranteed SS Behemoth & Magi
articles.body:
In the new mechanic, you'll receive a guaranteed SS Behemoth/Magi on your fifth 10+1 summon.

After your fourth summon, the "Get 1 S and above!" icon will change into "Get 1 SS!", informing you that the next one will have a guaranteed SS Behemoth/Magi.

articles.title: What is a Hunter ID and where can I find it?
articles.body: The Hunter ID is a ten-character alphanumeric code unique to every account. You can find your Hunter ID by going to Menu > Profile > Hunter ID.

articles.title: What is a Dragon Project ID?
articles.body: The Dragon Project ID is the name you register for your game account. You need your Dragon Project ID to transfer your game data to another device. You can register your Dragon Project ID by going to Menu > Options > Account Settings.

articles.title: Why can't I register my chosen Dragon Project ID?
articles.body:
You may experience trouble in registering your chosen Dragon Project ID if:

  • There are spaces at the beginning and end of your Dragon Project ID.
  • There are full-width characters in your chosen Dragon Project ID.
  • The Dragon Project ID you are trying to register is already taken

We also suggest that you enter your Dragon Project ID manually instead of copying and pasting to avoid additional spaces being included in your log-in form.

 If these still do not resolve the issue, please send us the following details through Customer Support:

  • The Dragon Project ID you wish to register
  • A screenshot showing the registration is not possible

articles.title: Can I change/delete my Dragon Project ID?
articles.body: Unfortunately, you cannot delete or change your Dragon Project ID.

articles.title: How can I retrieve my Dragon Project ID and password?
articles.body:
To retrieve your Dragon Project ID, simply open your game app and go to Menu > Options > Account Settings.

 For your password, contact Customer Support and provide the following details:

  • Your Hunter ID
  • Your Hunter name and level
  • The answer to your secret question

 Once you send us the above information, we'll contact you for your password.

articles.title: Can I combine multiple accounts and merge my game data?
articles.body: No, Dragon Project is designed to only have one saved game per player, account, and device. Combining multiple accounts to merge game data is not possible.

articles.title: Why can't I run the game?
articles.body:
Dragon Project runs on iOS 10 and above for Apple devices and Version 4.1 (Jelly Bean) and above for Android devices. It also requires a minimum of 2 GB RAM. Please check if your device meets these requirements.

Also, Dragon Project does not support the following devices:

  • Nexus S
  • Huawei dtab01
  • Panasonic P-02D
  • Meizu Mx4
  • ASUS Memo Pad 7
  • NEC Lavie Tab E

 If you're still having trouble running the game, contact Customer Support and we’ll help you sort it out.

articles.title: I'm having trouble downloading the game. What should I do?
articles.body:
The game's download progress usually depends on the availability of your network signal, as well as the data limit set by your mobile carrier.

You can improve your download progress by trying any of the following:

  • Switch to a better Internet connection (3G, 4G LTE, or Wi-Fi).
  • Close all other running/background applications.
  • Change the time zone of your device and try reconnecting the game again.
  • Restart your device and relaunch the application.

If you still can't complete your download, please check if your mobile carrier has set a maximum speed or any similar limitations to your connection, and contact them regarding this matter.

articles.title: Account verification has failed. What should I do?
articles.body:
The “Account verification has failed” error prompt is usually due to problems with your log-in details.

You can avoid encountering this error by:

  • Entering your Dragon Project ID and password accurately.
  • Typing your Dragon Project ID and password manually (avoid copying and pasting)
  • Checking if there are no spaces before and after your Dragon Project ID.

If these do not resolve the issue, contact our Customer Support and provide the following details:

  • Your Hunter ID
  • Hunter name and level
  • Answer to your secret question

articles.title: What is Error 003001 003020?
articles.body: Error 003001 003020 appears when you try to register an already existing Dragon Project ID. To avoid this error, register a different Dragon Project ID with six (6) or more half-width alphanumeric characters.

articles.title: What is Error 032203?
articles.body:
Error 032203 happens when you try to join a Quest party but it is already full. Only a maximum of four (4) Hunters can participate in a Quest and sometimes these slots can be filled up fast.

But don’t be disappointed—there are always other parties to join and many more monsters to hunt!

articles.title: What is Error 001004?
articles.body:
One of the two following reasons can cause Error 001004:

  • Another device is already using your account.
  • You have restored your account from a backup application such as iTunes or iCloud.

 To fix this error, delete and reinstall Dragon Project and then try logging in again.

 If the issue persists, contact Customer Support and provide the following details:

  • Hunter ID
  • Hunter name and level
  • Answer to your secret question
  • Last log-in date and time

articles.title: How do I transfer my game data to another device?
articles.body:
To transfer your game data to another device, you need first to register an account. Simply go to Menu > Options > Account Settings and register your account.

 

Once you have registered your account, you can transfer your game data to another device by following these easy steps:

  1. Install and launch Dragon Project on the new device.
  2. Tap “Change Device” at the bottom of the start screen.

   3. Tap “Log in”.

   4. Enter your registered Dragon Project ID and password and tap "Done".

articles.title: The "Change Device" link is missing. What should I do?
articles.body:
The "Change Device" link that lets you transfer data to another device only appears if the new device has no pre-existing game data. If the link doesn't appear and you need to transfer your saved game data to a new device, follow these simple steps: 

For Android users:

1. Go to Settings > Application > Application Manager > All > Dragon Project and Select "Clear Data".
2. Launch the game. You should see the "Change Device" link now.

For iOS users:
1. Tap and hold the Dragon Project app icon until it starts to jiggle.
2. Tap "X" and then agree to delete the app.
3. Visit the App Store to download Dragon Project again.
4. Launch the game. You should see the "Change Device" link now. 

Note that once you transfer the game data to a new device, all pre-existing game data on that device will be overwritten.

articles.title: How can I purchase Gems?
articles.body:
To purchase Gems, follow these steps:

  1. Tap the circle icon found on the bottom right of your screen.

         

     2. Tap "Summon".

         

     3. Tap "Buy Gems" on the upper right side of the screen.

         

     4. Select the number of Gems you wish to purchase.

         

You can also purchase available bundles when you tap the "Bundles" tab.

articles.title: I didn’t receive the items I bought. What should I do?
articles.body:
Purchased items usually arrive once you buy them but delivery can take a while (up to 24 hours) if payment needs further verification.

However, if your items are still not delivered after 24 hours, contact our Customer Support and submit the following details:

  • Name of the item(s) you bought
  • Transaction receipt
  • E-mail address you used for the transaction

articles.title: How do I control my character?
articles.body:
Here's a quick guide to playing Dragon Project.

Slide to move
Slide your finger anywhere on the screen to the direction you want your character to go.

Flick to dodge
To dodge enemy attacks, flick your finger across the screen quickly and watch your character roll forward, backward, or sideways, depending on the direction you are swiping towards.

Tap to attack
When you tap anywhere on the screen, your character automatically attacks the closest opponent within its range. There's no need to tap directly on the opponent.

Tap and hold to unleash your weapon's Special Action
Each weapon has a Special Action: Guard for Swords & Shields, Cleave for greatswords, Frenzy for dual blades, Lunge for spears, and Snipe Shot for bows. Tap and hold to unleash the Special Action.

Approach to interact
When playing Dragon Project, you will meet the many interesting residents of Heiland, such as Pamela the Guild Assistant, Boldon the Blacksmith, Sylvie the Alchemist, and more! Move near them to start a conversation.

articles.title: What is Hunting?
articles.body: Hunting is an essential part of the gameplay in Dragon Project. You play as a hunter that fights strong monsters and gather monster parts or materials to forge powerful weapons and armor. To hunt monsters, you can either explore the vast kingdom of Heiland or team up with three (3) other hunters and go on a quest to defeat Behemoths—the most fearsome monsters in the game!

articles.title: Where can I get new weapons and armor?
articles.body:
In Dragon Project, you create your own weapons and armor in the Armory using the materials dropped by slain monsters.

To forge weapons and armor, simply follow these instructions:

  1. Tap the circle icon located at the bottom right of your screen.
  2. Tap "Armory".
  3. Tap "Forge" to talk to Boldon the Blacksmith.
  4. Tap "Weapon" to create a new weapon or tap "Armor" to make a new armor.

Note that you'll also need to spend some gold coins when making a new weapon or armor.

articles.title: What are the different weapon classes?
articles.body:
The weapons in Dragon Project are categorized into five classes, each having their own individual characteristics and Special Actions.

Sword & Shield

Special Action: Guard

         

Counter

 

The Sword & Shield is ideal for players with a defensive strategy. Its Special Action: Guard lets players block enemies' blows and release a powerful counterattack instantly after guarding.

Great Sword

Special Action: Cleave

The Great Sword is a two-handed weapon with a destructive swing, but its heavy weight may burden the player's movement. With its Special Action: Cleave, the great sword can inflict even greater damage to enemies.   

Dual Blades

Special Action: Frenzy

For players who crave for high-speed action, Dual Blades are the best choice. Its Special Action: Frenzy lets players unleash an aerial attack that overwhelms enemies with multiple continuous hits.

 Spear

Special Action: Lunge                                              

         

Thrust

 

A tactical weapon, the Spear has a long reach that lets player deal melee damage outside their opponent's range. Players who wield spears can also launch high-speed charge attacks toward their enemies with its Special Action: Lunge. 

Bow

Special Action: Snipe Shot

Snipe Shot: Field                   

Snipe Shot: Behemoth Battle

 

Damage Over Time

Bows let players deal damage from afar. Its Special Action: Snipe Shot launches a deadly arrow that can leave damage over time.

You can try out each of these weapons and find the best one that suits your style.

articles.title: How can I obtain new skills?
articles.body:
You can obtain new magical skills using a special item called Magi.

Once you insert a Magi on your equipment, you'll be granted a skill that you can use in battle, provided that your Magi gauge is full.

There are different types of Magi: Some can grant you with devastating elemental attacks, and some can heal you or give your party a status boost.

You can obtain more Magi through Magi Summon, by following the instructions below:

  1. Tap "Summon" on the circle icon at the bottom right corner of your screen.
  2. Tap "To Magi Summon" on the upper left corner of your screen.
  3. Use 15 Gems to summon one random Magi or 150 Gems to summon 11 random Magi.
  4. Insert your Magi to your chosen equipment. Make sure that the shape of your Magi fits the Magi slot of your equipment.

articles.title: What is Summoning?
articles.body:
In Dragon Project, summoning is the best way for players to make their characters stronger.

There are two types of summoning in Dragon Project:

  • Quest Summon, which costs 25 Gems each (or 250 Gems for 11 summons), allows players to go on a Quest and hunt down hard-to-beat boss monsters called Behemoths. 

  • Magi Summon, which costs 15 Gems each (or 150 Gems for 11 summons), allows players to obtain different types of Magi.

articles.title: What are Behemoths?
articles.body:
Behemoths are the most difficult but most rewarding monsters to defeat in Dragon Project.

Occasionally, when roaming around the fields of Heiland, you'll receive the warning: "Behemoth Approaching!" This means that a Behemoth is nearby, and you'll be teamed up with three (3) other Hunters to defeat the monster. 

When you successfully bring down the Behemoth, you'll be rewarded with rare materials that you can use to forge stronger weapons and armor, making you more formidable to hunt even more powerful behemoths!

articles.title: What is Quest Summon?
articles.body:
Quest Summon is one of the two types of summoning in Dragon Project, the other being Magi Summon. Quest Summon lets a player and three other Hunters to go on a Quest to fight a random Behemoth.

To start a Quest Summon, follow these steps:

1. Open the circle icon found on the bottom right of your screen and then tap "Summon".

2. If you're in the Magi Summon screen, Tap "To Behemoths" to switch to the Quest Summon screen. If you're already at the Quest Summon screen, you can either spend 25 Gems (or 5 summon tickets) to summon one Behemoth or 250 Gems (or 50 summon tickets) to summon 11 Behemoths.

3. Once you've summoned a Behemoth, you can choose to fight it right away and start the Quest or hunt it later by visiting Axel in Town.

Starting a Quest and defeating Behemoths will help you earn Tablets—rare materials required in making stronger equipment!

articles.title: Can I run a Quest multiple times?
articles.body: You can attempt your Quest multiple times until you defeat your target Behemoth,  but if you fail to complete your Quest within 90 days, you can no longer finish your Quest. But don't worry! You'll still receive the Tablet from the Behemoth at the end of the Quest period.

articles.title: In Quest Summon List, what do the flame marks under the monster name mean?
articles.body: The flame marks under the Behemoth's name tell how hard it is to defeat the monster. The more flame marks there are, the harder it is to bring down that Behemoth.

articles.title: I defeated a Behemoth in a Quest—where’s my equipment?
articles.body:
The Tablets you earn from defeating a Behemoth during a Quest are the materials you need to forge stronger equipment.

To get your desired equipment, you must:

  1. Go to "Armory" and Tap Forge.
  2. Select the equipment (weapon or armor) that you would like to forge.
  3. Look for the equipment that you want to make using your Tablet then tap "Forge".

articles.title: Can a guest Hunter earn Tablets from Quests?
articles.body: When the four Hunters successfully defeat a Behemoth during a Quest, only the host Hunter will be rewarded with a Tablet. The three guest Hunters may also obtain a Tablet from the Quest, but the chance is very low.

articles.title: How do I forge my own equipment?
articles.body:
You can create weapons and armor using the materials dropped by slain monsters. To start making equipment, simply follow these instructions:

1. Tap the circle icon and go to "Armory".

 

2. In your Equipment Menu, Tap "Forge" to talk to Boldon the Blacksmith. 

3. Choose if you want to create a weapon or armor.

 

4. Tap on the equipment you want to create and then tap "Forge".

articles.title: How can I enhance my equipment?
articles.body:
You need to look for certain materials to enhance the level of your equipment. But don't worry! There's no need to run around the maps or fight random Behemoths to gather these materials.

Simply follow these steps and you'll complete the materials you need to enhance your equipment in no time:

1. Tap the circle icon on the bottom right part of your screen.

         

2. Tap "Armory".

         

3. Select and tap the weapon or armor that you want to enhance or tap "Forge".

         

4. If you've selected an equipment icon, Tap "Enhance". If you've selected "Forge," tap "Equipment". 

           

5. On the next screen, you'll see the materials to enhance your selected equipment. Tap the material that you need.

         

6. You'll see a list of possible locations and monsters that drop the materials you need. Select any area from the list and then confirm.

articles.title: How can I obtain materials?
articles.body:
There are several ways that Hunters can gather materials to enhance their equipment. Hunters can gather materials by defeating monsters in the field, defeating Behemoths, and by participating in events.

Gathering materials in the field:

You can get materials when you're out on the field by defeating monsters.

1. Attack monsters                          

            

2. A chest may drop from defeated monsters

3. Attack the chest

       

4. Obtain the material

Gathering materials through harvest points:

1. Points that can be harvested will sparkle.

2. Once you get near the harvest point, a symbol will appear.

3. Tap the screen once you see the symbol to begin harvesting and obtain the material.

 

 

Gathering materials by defeating Behemoths:

Defeated Behemoths will drop materials that you need to upgrade equipment sets.

Make sure to destroy Behemoth parts to increase the chances of getting materials.

         

 

Gathering materials by participating in events:

By accomplishing event missions, you can get materials and equipment that you won't get anywhere else.

1. Visit Linton when you're in the town to check all available events. New events will be indicated if there are any.

         

2. Clearing some event missions will reward you with materials.

articles.title: What is Limit Break and how do I do it?
articles.body:
Limit Break is a way to enhance your equipment even beyond its set level. Limit break can grant your equipment stronger attack, tougher defense, or an extra Magi slot. You can limit break your weapon up to four (4) times.

Limit breaking your equipment requires the material Lapis. The type and quantity of Lapis you need for limit breaking depend on the rank of your chosen equipment. For example, to limit break an S-rank equipment, you may use 30 Lapis Shards or 10 Lapis or 1 High Lapis.

Here’s how you can limit break your weapon:

1. Visit the "Armory" and tap on the equipment you want to limit break.

2. Tap "Enhance".

3. Tap "Limit Break".

4. Tap the Lapis you want to use.

articles.title: What are Lapis and how can I use them?
articles.body:
Lapis are special materials that you need to limit break your equipment.

There are many different types of Lapis: the regular Lapis, Rainbow Lapis, Arc Lapis, and High Lapis. Depending on the rank of your equipment, the type and quantity of Lapis needed to limit break will be different.

To find out what type and how many Lapis you need to limit break:

1. Go to "Armory".

2. Tap the equipment you wish to limit break.

3. Tap "Enhance".

4. Tap "Limit Break".

 

4. At the bottom of the screen, look at the type and quantity of Lapis you need for limit breaking.

 

 You can also tap the Lapis to check what equipment or Tablets you need to sell to obtain them.

If you have the right Lapis but you are still having trouble with limit breaking, please send us a message at our Customer Support with the following information:

  • The equipment you wish to limit break
  • The type and quantity of the Lapis you currently have

articles.title: I sold my Equipment/Slate. Why didn't I get a Lapis?
articles.body:
You can obtain Lapis only by selling Class B and above Equipment or Tablets. 

Be reminded of the following:

  • You cannot obtain Lapis by selling Equipment that is C-rank or lower.
  • You can obtain Lapis by selling a Tablet you received from a Quest.
  • You can obtain Lapis by selling Equipment you forged using Tablets you received from a Quest.

If you have sold the appropriate equipment or Tablet, but you still didn't obtain the Lapis, please send us a message at our Customer Support with the following information:

  • Date and time of the sale
  • Name of the equipment or Tablet
  • Type of Lapis you should have obtained

articles.title: What is Magi Summon?
articles.body:
For Magi Summon, you need to spend 15 Gems or 150 Gems to draw a Magi at random.

You can insert Magi into your equipment and obtain skills that you can use in the hunt, provided that your Magi gauge is full.

To summon a Magi into your possession, follow these steps:

1. Tap the circle icon and go to "Summon".

2. Tap "To Magi".

3. Use 15 Gems to summon one random Magi or 150 Gems to summon 11 random Magi.

You can insert the Magi you have received into your equipment as long as your equipment has a compatible Magi slot.

articles.title: Why can’t I insert a Magi?
articles.body:
Magi comes in many shapes, and you can only insert a Magi that shares the shape of the slot in your equipment. 

               

If the shape is not compatible with your current equipment, you can do either of the following:

  • Find another equipment that has a slot compatible with your Magi.
  • Find a different Magi that is compatible with your current equipment.

Also, as you play the game, you'll soon discover that some Magi are only for armor and some are exclusively for weapons.

If you still can't insert your Magi to the slot of your equipment even if their shapes are the same, please send Customer Support a screenshot of the Magi and the slot of the equipment, and we'll find you a fix.

articles.title: How can I insert Magi to my equipment?
articles.body:
You can equip Magi to your equipment by following these steps:

     1. Tap the circle icon on the bottom right part of the screen and go to "Armory".

         

     2. Choose a weapon or armor with the appropriate Magi slot. You can also press "Insert Magi".

         

     3. Select the slot where you'll equip the Magi.

         

     4. Select the Magi that you want to equip and then confirm.
